GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15.61 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
wifi: wil6210: debugfs: fix uninitialized variable use in `wil_write_file_wmi()`

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 689e5caf63e99e15d2f485ec297c1bf9243e0e28, it was introduced in version v5.15.61 by commit 074e865b37da55aa87baa16d68b96896f85f8adb. For more details please see the references link.
